name: OGP Bulk Sender
shortDescription: Send your native coins, tokens, and NFTs in batches.
description: If you need to send crypto to multiple wallets, do an airdrop for a new token, or simply gift some crypto to your friends and family, this app is perfect for you. Supports multiple EVM chains. Simple 3 step process which includes uploading addresses and amounts you wish to send, review before sending, and finally sending the amounts to each respectful address. Supports native coins, ERC-20, ERC-721, and ERC-1155.
